did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: AstoriaManuscript, Accession # 6256-am, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library by Marion Kingsford Trousoff on 9 June 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a holograph manuscript of Washington Irving's Astoria, consisting of chapters one through four and chapters fifty through sixty-one.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 1, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 27 l., summary on unnumbered leaf at the beginning, and remaining leaves numbered 1-26.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 2, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
Astoria, Chapter 3, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 29 l., summary on unnumbered leaf at the beginning, remaining leaves numbered 1-27, with page 17 on two separate leaves, the second unnumbered.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 4, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 18 l., summary on unnumbered leaf at the beginning, and remaining leaves numbered 1-16, with page 8 consisting of two separate leaves both numbered 8.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 50, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 18 l., summary and page 1 unnumbered at the beginning, and remaining leaves numbered 2-17.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 51, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 11 l., page 1 unnumbered and the remaining leaves numbered 2-11.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 52, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 15 l., summary and page one on unnumbered leaf at the beginning, remaining leaves numbered 2-8; and new numbering of leaves 4-10 at the end of the chapter.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 53, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 25 l., numbered 1-23, lacking a leaf numbered 15; and with page 5 on 2 leaves and page 6 on 3 leaves.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 54, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 8 l., page 1 on unnumbered leaf, and remaining leaves numbered 2-8.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 55, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 5 l., page 1 unnumbered and the remaining leaves numbered 2-5.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 56, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 9 l., page 1 on an unnumbered leaf and remaining leaves numbered 2-9.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 57, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 17 l., page 1 unnumbered and the remaining leaves numbered 2-17.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 58, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 16 l., page 1 unnumbered, lacking a leaf numbered 2; and remaining leave numbered 3-14, with page 12 on 3 leavesand page 14 on 2 leaves.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 59, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 11 l., page 1 unnumbered and the remaining leaves numbered 2-11.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 60, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 11 l., page 1 unnumbered and the remaining leaves numbered 2-7, 9-12, lacking a page 8.

did.unittitle: Astoria, Chapter 61, by Washington Irving ca. 1835
did.physdesc: AMs, 22 l., page 1 unnumbered and the remaining leaves numbered 2-22.
